author: hwright
msg: release.py: use a loop where appropriate.
(RollDep, AutoconfDep, LibtoolDep, SwigDep): Update reference to self.label.
(build_env): Iterate over the list of deps, rather than doing so manually.

author: hwright
msg: release.py: We can't trust that the system libtool won't be patched in a
brain-damaged way (I'm looking at you, Debian), so never attempt to use it.

author: hwright
msg: release.py: A second pass at ensuring we have the proper rolling dependencies
by consolidating the building and checking code into a class heirarchy.
(build_end): Use the new object-oriented rolling dependency checkers
